title: 12 Days of Avengers Christmas Drabbles
body:
Summary: Christmas special! For twelve days, I will post a Christmas drabble per day. They will each feature a different Avenger and be entirely unconnected. Each drabble will be between 200 and 300 words and all are reader inserts.

Total Chapters: 12

Series Warnings: Most drabbles are pure fluff, but days 4, 5, and 7 are a bit angsty

Author’s Note: I’ve been writing and editing and re-editing these things since August, guys. I’m so ready. Posting the 12th through the 23rd so I don’t have to worry about posting on Christmas Eve or Christmas.

——————–

Chapters:

Day 1: Christmas in the Tropics (Clint Barton) 

Day 2: A Ride through the Park (Bucky Barnes) 

Day 3: Snow Angels (Sam Wilson) - coming 12/14/18

Day 4: Hot Cocoa (Bruce Banner) - coming 12/15/18

Day 5: Substitute Family (Thor and Loki) - coming 12/16/18

Day 6: Santa Baby (James Rhodes) - coming 12/17/18

Day 7: Christmas without Them (Wanda and Pietro Maximoff) - coming 12/18/18

Day 8: Christmas Wish (Tony Stark) - coming 12/19/18

Day 9: The Perfect Present (Steve Rogers) - coming 12/20/18

Day 10: The Ugliest Christmas Sweater (Scott Lang and Hope Van Dyne) - coming 12/21/18

Day 11: Holiday Bullets (Natasha Romanoff) - coming 12/22/18

Day 12: Mistletoe (Peter Parker) - coming 12/23/18

summary: Okay, I get that everyone is upset about the trailer being moved to Friday, but you have to remember: it’s coming out on FRIDAY....
body: Okay, I get that everyone is upset about the trailer being moved to Friday, but you have to remember: it’s coming out on FRIDAY. THIS WEEK. WE WILL KNOW THE TITLE OF THIS FILM. NO MORE A4 BULLCRAP. WE WILL SEE SCENES OF THIS MOVIE. We will possibly get new MUSIC, DIALOGUE, PLOT POINTS, ALL OF IT. ON FRIDAY. So I think that after all this time, we can try to sit still for a few days more. But, if they move it again, we attack. Cool?

blog.name: arsanatomica
blog.title: Morphology. Drawing. Life.
blog.description:
Morphology is the architecture of life. The ingenuity of form and function.....breathtaking through tattered remains. 

I prepare skeletons for study, draw things and take pictures. 

KairoAnatomica@gmail.com

summary: You guys check this out! In Norse mythology, Slepnir is the eight legged horse of Odin. Here is a real life eight hoofed horse....
caption:
You guys check this out! In Norse mythology, Slepnir is the eight legged horse of Odin. Here is a real life eight hoofed horse.

Most people are familiar with Polydactyly. It’s when you have additional fingers or toes. It’s very common in cats. But Polydactyly can occur in all vertebrates. In the horses, their hoof is actually a single finger. Through the course of evolution they have lost all of their fingers and toes except one on each foot.

So when Polydactyly develops in horses, they gain additional hooves.

These pictures were taken by Ferrucio Blengio who the farrier in Italy. It is unknown whether this horse got eight shoes or four.


Other places to see my stuff:
INSTAGRAM / FACEBOOK / ETSY

blog.name: starks-ai-observations
blog.title: Stark's AI Observations
blog.description:
A collection of boring, petty headcanons regarding the Avengers and friends.
--This is my own personal AU--
Influenced primarily by fanon, with some of the animated series, comics, and a teeny bit of the MCU.
Concerns? Ask before you assume, please. My inbox is always open!

summary: Bucky and Steve still think bananas taste weird compared to the bananas in the past.
body:
Bucky and Steve still think bananas taste weird compared to the bananas in the past.

Fun fact, “banana” flavored candy is flavored to replicate a popular type of banana that is now extinct!

blog.name: super-nerd-97
blog.title: Super Nerd
blog.description:
I DO NOT OWN ANY CONTENT UNLESS STATED OTHERWISE!
Trust me when I say that I am the biggest nerd and biggest child you will ever meet! But that isn't necessarily a bad thing, I am a responsible and respectful 20 year old adult living in Australia. I am pretty much into every kind of fandom, a brief list of them are: Marvel, Star Wars, Lord of The Rings / The Hobbit, How To Train Your Dragon, Ratchet & Clank, DC, Disney, Yu-Gi-Oh, Transformers, Harry Potter, Once Upon a Time, Game of Thrones, Beyblade, Supernatural, Pokémon and many others. I will be posting and sharing content related to those topics. Also, I am student of most sciences so expect to see some posts related to that as well.
